Description:
Perfectly positioned for starting up or sizing down
This home has instant appeal whether you are looking for your first home or for a solid investment with low maintenance and well designed.
Comprising of:
- 3 Good sized bedrooms
- Large bathroom with bath and shower
- Open plan living and dining area
- Well designed kitchen with gas cooking
- Ducted heating
Also has carpeted bedrooms, tiled wet areas, single garage and low maintenance backyard. Property is well located close to schools, shopping centres, and major arterial roads for family convenience.
Get in quick to secure this one!

Description:
All about the Location!
This stunning home is a perfect place for first home buyers and small families who love the convenience of central living but still want a peaceful neighbourhood. Sitting in one of Dandenong’s most popular pockets you will literally feel as though everything is around the corner with St Mary’s Primary School, St John’s Regional College, public transport services and all major shops including Plaza and Market just a short walk away. The modern townhouse which has independent driveway access from the street offers dual living zones with a formal lounge area and an open plan family, meals and kitchen area that is perfect for entertaining friends and family. Additionally you will find 2 good sized bedrooms including a master bedroom with walk in robe and private balcony, central bathroom and 2 separate toilets including ground floor powder room, single lock up garage with direct internal access and a low maintenance courtyard which is well connected to the family area and makes summer entertaining easy. With an array of features including functional kitchen with gas stove, lots cupboard and bench space, central ducted heating, downlights through downstairs area, tiles and laminate timber flooring throughout and front roller shutter this property has everything that a modern home should have. Do not wait until this one is gone because you may be waiting for a while for another one like it. Arrange to inspect before it is too late.Contact: Neb Delibasic on 0411 332 467
Auction: Saturday 10th March 2018 at 11:30am, On Site
Terms: 10% Deposit, Balance in 30-45 Days
TO VIEW THE CONSUMER AFFAIRS DUE DILIGENCE CHECKLIST PLEASE VISIT http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

DANDENONG'S BEST PRICED THREE BEDROOM HOME!
This three bedroom home is centrally located within easy walk to the Plaza and the renowned Dandenong Market.
There is a large lounge entry and a separate kitchen/meals which is original and could come up a treat with your own input.
Currently let to great tenants who would love to stay on but Vacant Possession is available.
No Stamp Duty to approved First Home Buyers!
Great rear yard and ideal for future redevelopment (STCA).
FIRST HOME BUYER'S SPECIAL!

Description:
Stunning Home with Potential Dual Occupancy (STCA)
Great family living and set in a fantastic location, this home represents great value and offers wonderful opportunity for its next lucky owner.
Boasting 2 spacious bedrooms plus 3rd bedroom in the bungalow, kitchen with gas cooking and dishwasher, separate dining room, spacious living area, 2 reverse cycle split system air-conditioners including in the bungalow, powered garage plus shed, low maintenance garden and off street parking. Resting on a good sized block of approx. 556m2 with potential dual occupancy (STCA).
Not only is this a beautiful home, it is situated in an ideal location just walking distance to Dandenong Plaza, Hospital, Tafe College, Dental and medical centres plus easy access to the Monash Freeway & Eastlink. Enjoy the convenience of a bike and walking track at the end of the street.
An opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Pure Gold! A Rare Corner Development Opportunity!
An exciting affordable opportunity for starters, developers, builders or secure it and build your dream home.
Get into this sought after location – a corner block approximately 600sqm in a court location with an existing brick-veneer home, comprising of 3 bedrooms, lounge, dining, kitchen, meals area, laundry & bathroom and sit out on the big balcony with a glass of wine to enjoy the views .
Step outside and enjoy the courtyard and BBQ area in the covered pergola, side gardens and potential wine cellar. Savour the big land on the left side and enjoy a bonus of a single garage and car parking spaces.
This house has multiple options: STCA:
Enjoy living in the existing spacious home or lease it out to the current tenant whilst planning for further development! Or demolish the house and build 2 townhouses or build your massive dream home!
Just moments from all facilities in Dandenong, within walking distance to Yarraman station, Dandenong West Primary School, Greaves and Fotheringham Reserves, within minutes drive to Dandenong Station, Plaza, Market, schools and all amenities.
Easy access to Princes Highway, Monash Freeway and Eastlink.
Call me today and secure this rare opportunity!

Description:
RARE GEM IN AN UNRIVALED LOCALE
LJ Hooker proudly presents this lovely brick veneer home which is ideal for all first home buyers, downsizers and astute investors looking to be nestled in a highly sought after central pocket of Dandenong. Sitting on 602m2 of prime soil approx. This home provides the convenient and ideal lifestyle you have been searching for.
Presenting 3 good sized bedrooms with BIR, a spacious lounge, dining area which is adjacent to the delightful kitchen equipped with gas cooking and an abundance of cupboard space. The main bathroom and separated toilet and laundry make up the interior of this wonderful home.
The enormous garage has a separate section for a workshop and plenty of storage. Another bonus is the fully utilised second kitchen - it sits right next to the pergola, offering the opportunity for blissful outdoor entertaining all year round.
Features of this home include: Ducted heating, split system, window shutters, water tank, work shop, garden shed and much more!
Located close to Dandenong High school, Dandenong Hospital, Dandenong Market, Chisholm Institute, Dandenong Plaza, The Pavilion, Parks, public transport and major arterial such as Princes Highway, Eastlink and Monash, This gem will not last long.
With the location and features like these, we would highly recommend you act soon before you see a SOLD sticker on the board!
Call Ben Jusufi or Burak Gul for any further information!
*PHOTO I.D. REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION*
*All information contained therein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
More Like a House!
Positioned at the front with only two on the block, this gorgeous unit is more like a house. You get space, relaxed living, an exceptional floor plan and all of the creature comforts you could hope for. This well designed home enjoys three bedrooms, the master fit for a king and queen with its size and stature, two bathrooms, a modern kitchen with a plethora of bench and storage space, plus not one but two outdoor courtyards for entertaining. This is a rare find, so don’t let it slip away!
Park in the lock up garage and securely make your way inside via the rear patio. Inside you get to enjoy a light filled home that will keep you comfortable all year long. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, gorgeous hardwood floors, plus it was renovated and well maintained for today’s easy living. The front large bedroom could easily double as a second living area, the neighbouring bedroom has an ensuite and the living room has direct access to the deck area. The kitchen is expertly positioned to entertain and unwind in the rear area and it comes with a dishwasher, large oven and loads of space.
An outstanding location ensures you a minutes from schools, shops, freeway entrances, public transport and more! This is a home that will suit investors, first home buyers, downsizers and even families, so call me today before it’s too late!
Insights: 1/1458 Heatherton Road, Dandenong VIC 3175 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Perfect home with development potential (STCA)
Versatility, contemporary finishes and a plethora of space at the rear! Ladies and gents, this great sized home is positioned on a block size of 690m2 (approx), previously had approved planning permit for a rear 3 bed unit that has now lapsed and is now your blank canvas for a bright future. Fully renovated inside and out,the home itself boasts sparkling timber floors, three bedrooms, the generous master with sizeable BIR, modern bathroom, a spacious open living area with adjacent meals and kitchen with gas cooking & plenty of bench and cupboard space. Entertain on the expansive rear timber deck overlooking the premium backyard – your future pot of gold which could easily be whatever your heart desires. Ideal investment or great place to call home with space to further develop either now or in the future. No matter how you view it, this is a winner!
The convenient location provides easy access to Dandenong West Primary School, Yarraman train station, Dandenong Central, Eastlink and other major arterials. Whether you retain the existing home and develop at the rear, demolish and do a multi townhouse/ unit development (STCA) or simply enjoy the space and serenity, you win!
Light, bright and presented to please, this home enjoys so many extras. Two split system units and gas heater heat and cool the home, awnings for those warmer months, floor to ceiling tiles in the bathroom and laundry, two toilets, roof restored with new guttering, new gas hot water system plus lengthy driveway beyond the manicured garden beds giving plenty of off street car parking.
Enjoy the quality throughout, but more importantly, love the space for potential future development (STCA).

HOUSE PLUS BUNGALOW WITH GREAT RENTAL RETURN
Combined rental return $2513 per month. Location is great for investment within a short distance to schools, public transport, religious places, eastlink and other amenities. Situated next to Dandenong Thunder Soccer Club , front original home features good size lounge and three bedrooms, spacious kitchen area, pergola and a backyard. More features are ducted heating, split aircon, floor boards and window awnings. Great tenants returning $300 per week on a fixed term lease.
Rear bungalow aprox 10 years old comprises of 2bedrooms, lounge and its own kitchen, laundry and bathroom. It has its own carport and a rainwater tank. Long standing tenants returning $280 per week on a periodic lease.
This may be perfect for a large family with grown up kids looking for 5 bedrooms or looking for In-law accommodation. Advantage of having separate gas and electricity meter connections. Also perfect for an astute investor looking to reap the benefits now or later with development potential (stca). An inspection will not disappoint you.

Description:
Buying a Home at Unit Value! Only 2 on the block!
Located in a highly desirable pocket of Dandenong, Unit 1 with own frontage, and only 2 on a block, this gorgeous look like new brick veneer residence suiting all home buyers & investor's offers tranquil living and a fresh lifestyle. Walk in and be amazed by the high cathedral ceiling and flexibility it offers. With an allotment of approx 281m, Comprising of:
- 3 bedrooms with BIR
- Master bedroom with WIR & full En-suite
- Spacious living areas with cathedral ceiling
- 2 Bathroom with 2 toilets
- Ducted heating plus 3 Split system A/C
- Kitchen With Gas appliances adjoin with sizable dining areas
- Lockup remote garage for 2 cars
- Undercover BBQ area and bonus 2nd kitchen
- Manicure low maintenance garden
This perfect home is freestanding. You will be delighted by the serenity knowing that you're only moments away from Primary and Secondary Schools, bus stops, Short drive to Dandenong Shopping Centre, Market and Hospital,. Also offers you easy access to M1, East link, Princes Hwy and other major roads. Arrange to inspect before it is too late!
